mapper.insert: insert into tb1_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tb1_board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updateDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from tb1_board where title = #{title} and content = #{content} and writer = #{writer}
